Uses of Class
org.apache.solr.util.DateFormatUtil.ThreadLocalDateFormat

  • Packages that use DateFormatUtil.ThreadLocalDateFormat 
    Package Description
    org.apache.solr.util
    Common utility classes used throughout Solr

    • Uses of DateFormatUtil.ThreadLocalDateFormat in org.apache.solr.util

      Fields in org.apache.solr.util declared as DateFormatUtil.ThreadLocalDateFormat 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static DateFormatUtil.ThreadLocalDateFormat DateFormatUtil.FORMAT_THREAD_LOCAL
      Thread safe DateFormat that can format in the canonical ISO8601 date format, not including the trailing "Z" (since it is left off in the internal indexed values)
